TextView.android:text:
PAN INDIA EVENT ALERT!!

 Greetings from PLC Cornelia!❤️

 PLC Corenlia, a club under Pink Legal is elevated to announce it's quarterly fest - ZENITH

 The fest will feature a multiplicity of various theme based events, which will be both empowering and enlightening. Put on your creativity hats and join us in the change-making process!

 Participate in the event and get a chance to win cash prizes, gift hampers, coupons, Internship opportunities and much more!

 A) Reel Making Competiton
 B) Quiz Competiton
 C) Story Writing Competiton
 D) Poetry Writing Competiton
 E) Conventional Debate


 For more details & registeration- https://linktr.ee/plc.cornelia
